stanza.speaker: SONYA

wp-ref.line: Hard as it is
In the coming days
I watch my friend
In her strange unnatural state
Don’t let her out of my sight

s-action.line: And I listen at the door

stanza.line: I see by the sad look on her face

wp-ref.line: There is a dreadful plan in her heart

stanza.speaker: SONYA
stanza.line: I know you are capable of anything
I know you so well my friend

wp-ref.line: I know you might just run away
What am I to do?
Who do I ask for help?
I will stand in the dark for you
I will hold you back by force
I will stand here right outside your door
I won’t see you disgraced
I will protect your name and your heart

stanza.speaker: SONYA
stanza.line: I know you so well my friend
I know you might just throw yourself over

wp-ref.line: And I remember this family
I remember their kindness
And if I never sleep again

stanza.speaker: SONYA

wp-ref.line: I will stand in the dark for you
I will hold you back by force
I will stand here right outside your door
I won’t see you disgraced
I will protect your name and your heart

stanza.line: Because I miss you, my friend
